channel.title: ๖ۣۜNRS3server V4
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2cijon7.png[/img]
Zealusion Developer adam tried to hack me and delete my rsps files so rather then that I will release this here have fun with this I will not be releasing a V5 for a very long time I have more important things to do now this will still be hosted I have no intention of letting valuable players lose there progress for hard worked stuff.
Here are some features
[size=14pt][b][u]Recent Updates:[/u][/b][/size] 80% Grand Exchange 729 items all working auras including supreme's eco base eco pricing flaming skulls specs for all items the should have Lucky item specs and bonuses Squeal of fortune
[size=12pt][u][b]Features:[/b][/u][/size] - Switching is near perfect - All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands and altars - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP - Auras are all complete except for Salvation and Corruption bonuses work wings are glitched
(Bosses) - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - 85% Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows{prizes glitchy still} & More...
Pvp/PK/PVM/Combat - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
Random Stuff: - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - music everyone knows that - custom maps - donorzones staffzones and more
Armours/Bosses: - All new 711 armours obv we all know - Bosses are upgraded to new looks - Jad waves maxed out to 65 - Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats - Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now - Quests are partially made]
Same Old Home [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/13yj8k0.jpg[/img] Ge 100% Buying [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/24ce0k7.png[/img] Ge 100% selling [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/x39t83.jpg[/img] Money Pouch 100% [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/abph8m.jpg[/img] Recipe For Disaster Minigame [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/25g7vq1.png[/img] Zombies Minigame [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/qx9n54.png[/img] Soul Wars Rewards [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/x43nfa.png[/img] Clan Wars [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/xbzh2w.png[/img] Fight Kiln all waves now [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/1z1fgxs.png[/img] Squeal spins tab spins according to player [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/35c07io.png[/img] Inside Random Prizes [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/359xo9l.png[/img] Claim item [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/9hjngh.png[/img]
Source (updated fixed mysql 732 opcodes find your own xteas and cache) [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?bmg79v4lswa3dtg]http://www.mediafire.com/?bmg79v4lswa3dtg[/url]
Use any Matrix Client I suggest this [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?zdafvd4592wgl7c]http://www.mediafire.com/?zdafvd4592wgl7c[/url] REMEMBER TO CHANGE IP FOR THIS CLIENT
To play this server look at the advertisement page [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,547952.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,547952.0.html[/url]
Credits TimeRS3 Zingerman111 Zealusion Matrix
[/center]

item.title: ๖ۣۜNRS3server V4
item.dc:creator: @frozenearth frozenearth
item.description:
@frozenearth wrote:

[quote=“frozenearth, post:430, topic:469130”]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19 at com.rs.utils.Utils.getItemDefinitionsSize(Utils.java:268) at com.rs.cache.loaders.ItemsEquipIds.init(ItemsEquipIds.java:13) at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:68)

how to fix this error?[/quote]

Still dont know.

Read full topic

item.title: ๖ۣۜNRS3server V4
item.dc:creator: @angelofdeath396 angelofdeath396
item.description:
@angelofdeath396 wrote:

[quote=“TimeRS3, post:432, topic:469130”][quote author=angelofdeath396 link=topic=586200.msg4404375#msg4404375 date=1391459224]

I think this server deserves a V5.

And I have a big problem. I tried to make myself owner by going in Player.java, and putting my name in for rights =10. When I login, no crown appears. Then I do ::giveadmin myname, ::admin myname , ::give adminme, and nothing worked.

Then I went onto Player.java AGAIN and set myself to rights = 2. I went in, did those same commamds, NOTHING worked. Then I went to Commands.java, and replaced “timebroken” with my username, as well as tried the two methods with rights =10 and rights = 2 and NOTHING happend. Any help please?

Guys please help!
[/quote]

When you log in I think i put GUI use that to promote yourself if not.

you have to use eclipse go into player.java and add the owner rank id # in to your name.

Only if you use eclipse will it work for some people its the opposite they might not need eclipse[/quote]

Thanks for helping. Tomorrow in the morning I’ll see what I can do. Compiler seems to work fine, but in this case, having eclipse is needed. And there is no GUI. Dhould the GUI load automatically or something? I see no GUI.

Read full topic

item.title: ๖ۣۜNRS3server V4
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

[quote=“angelofdeath396, post:431, topic:469130”][quote author=angelofdeath396 link=topic=586200.msg4404097#msg4404097 date=1391371983]
I think this server deserves a V5.

And I have a big problem. I tried to make myself owner by going in Player.java, and putting my name in for rights =10. When I login, no crown appears. Then I do ::giveadmin myname, ::admin myname , ::give adminme, and nothing worked.

Then I went onto Player.java AGAIN and set myself to rights = 2. I went in, did those same commamds, NOTHING worked. Then I went to Commands.java, and replaced “timebroken” with my username, as well as tried the two methods with rights =10 and rights = 2 and NOTHING happend. Any help please?
[/quote]

Guys please help![/quote]

When you log in I think i put GUI use that to promote yourself if not.

you have to use eclipse go into player.java and add the owner rank id # in to your name.

Only if you use eclipse will it work for some people its the opposite they might not need eclipse

Read full topic
